name: Sweet and Savory Chicken Puff Pastry Shells
author: Ms.P.
summary: This puff pastry recipe also works great with leftover chicken or turkey. If the filling looks a little dry because your apples didn't turn out juicy, you can add a little apple cider or even some white wine.
ingredients: 2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into small cubes
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Arrange pastry shells on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat
Add apples; cook and stir until slightly softened, 3 to 5 minutes
Add bacon; cook until sizzling, about 1 minute
Add chicken; cook and stir until no longer pink, 5 to 7 minutes
Divide filling over the 6 baked shells right out of the oven
